awd_titl_txt: Department-Wide Implementation of a NeXT/Mathematica        Laboratory for Calculus
awd_abstract_narration: This proposal requests matching funds for the purchase of NeXT                  computers and software to establish a Mathematica-Based                         Calculus laboratory for use beginning Fall 1992.  The                           successful completion of this project will provide the                          following to other institutions:  (1) A model for full                          implementation of a Calculus laboratory program.  (2) A                         successful model for intradepartmental "bootstrap"                              dissemination of Calculus Reform.  (3) A collection of                          laboratory modules that can be used with any Calculus textbook,                 and in any Mathematica-Based Calculus laboratory.  (4)                          Improvements to Mathemtica for use in Calculus laboratories,                    including increased flexibility of syntax and a much improved                   plotting command.
